name: Socket Punching
description: Allows socketing and unsocketing an item using jewels.
author: olegbl

config.name: Socketing Recipes
config.description: Enable to allow socketing an unsocketed item by transmuting it together with 1-6 jewels.

config.name: Socket Emptying Recipes
config.description: Enable to allow removing an item's sockets' contents by transmuting it together with a jewel.
